name: Girl UP
description:
On a Pacific beach, there was a couple celebrating their first anniversary together. They had saved for a whole year to treat themselves and take a break after all the days of work. The woman, known as Violeta, and the man, Camilo, found themselves in a perfect paradise with calm and salty waters, golden sand, coconut-filled palm trees for hydration, the song of seagulls and birds at dawn, and the sun rising from the coast. The days flew by with the pleasant island atmosphere, and the joyful people were amazed by the beauty of nature in all its splendor.

One day, the two of them were sunbathing, and suddenly, the weather changed. The sky turned pink, and Violeta began to have a feeling that something bad was about to happen. She looked at Camilo as he danced in a curious way, and they ran out of the magnetic field. Camilo felt like something was pulling him; he looked down and thought, "It's a good time to meditate." He disappeared moments later.

.
A fantastic third-person game about climbing various obstacles to reach the summit. Immerse yourself in the thrill of jumping with precision. You'll be able to control a motorized vehicle for greater climbing speed and receive assistance from Robot Gedor, who will lend you its body to complete the challenge.
Complete the puzzles you come across in your adventure, using your wit to solve them. Overcome each journey, and you will find that the sweetest rewards await those who refuse to give up on their ascent to greatness!

.

Your goal is to find out where Camilo is, what his whereabouts are, and why he was taken to the sky.
.

Map: Remote island with fascinating dimensions next to a beautiful sea.

*Characters:
Violeta: A lovely girl who will be in search of her beloved.
Robot Gedor: Your ally who will provide you with tools to solve the puzzles.
Camilo: The lost one.

Single Player: Girl Up currently supports single-player mode.

Abilities: Violeta possesses the Time-Jump ability, which allows her to return to a specific location.

*Vehicle: You'll be able to control vehicles for greater agility.
Girl, UP.
